description.value: You trample your foes as you charge past them. When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Barreling Charge] and successfully move through a creature's space, that creature takes [[/r @actor.abilties.str.mod[bludgeoning]]]{bludgeoning damage} equal to your Strength modifier. If you critically succeed, the creature takes [[/r 2*@actor.abilties.str.mod[bludgeoning]]]{twice this amount of damage} and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Flat-Footed] until the end of your next turn.
